page.title: 01GARFORTH JUDO CLUB
page.content: Every Friday I go to {Garforth Judo {Club.}The instructor teaches members how to defend themselves. We learn how to throw an attacker on to the floor and hold him down. We have{fighting contests}to practise our skills. If you begin to get hurt you tap on the floor and your opponent must let you go. If he doesn't he he receives a penalty point. You must always be careful to land properly to avoid serious injury. Some moves, like strangle holds, are very dangerous and if not released immediately could lead to loss of consciousness. No-one must mess about! Sometimes we have{fun days}to help raise money. These involve events such as{bed races}(someone on a bed is pushed round an obstacle course by four team-mastes), or{pillow fights.} Club nights{cost 80p}for two hours.
